resources.string: Use TryCamel to see the price history of items on Amazon.
Step 1: Shop as you normally do with the Amazon app or a web browser.
Step 2: On any product, locate the share button.
Here\'s what it looks like if you are using the Amazon app.
If you are using a web browser, you\'ll need to find the share button in the browser itself.
Usually, it\'s in the menu with the 3 dots in the top right of the screen.
Beware of this share button. Do not use it.
It shares within the Amazon website rather than to the Android system.
Step 3: Use the correct share button and share with TryCamel
Step 4: That\'s it. \nTry it now with this link: http://a.co/4ps1EIe
And this app is free? Whoever made this must be the nicest person.
